title: 820-2899-B super slow boot almost does't boot in OS
message:
I have 820-2936-b after water damage repair the macbook boot super slow the water damage was around the keyboard connector area i replaced the keyboard connector because was damaged. Any ideas??? i 

its not the HDD i already checked also check the HDD cable and try to boot from USB same result. Also try to boot with nothing plugged but HDD, LCD and RAM still same. Any suggestions ?

title: 820-2899-B super slow boot almost does't boot in OS
message: Run ASD and check sensor errors.

title: 820-2899-B super slow boot almost does't boot in OS
message: I can't Enter in ASD. If i hold option button let me choose HDD i connect to network and check all the key on keyboard if they work because i replaced the keyboard connector so the keys are working but lagging when i press. Any ideas ?

title: 820-2899-B super slow boot almost does't boot in OS
message: could it be corrupt ME region in BIOS?

title: 820-2899-B super slow boot almost does't boot in OS
message: I guess this is 820-2879 LB, it is intel core 2 duo, so, no ME region on this board.....

title: 820-2899-B super slow boot almost does't boot in OS
message:
No Title

Actually was bad camera connector that's why wouldn't boot im actually surprised J3402 there is 2 lines connected with the SMC. SMBUS_SMC_A_S3_SCL and SMBUS_SMC_A_S3_SDA. After replacing the connector macbook is working perfect.

title: 820-2899-B super slow boot almost does't boot in OS
message: If you would've booted ASD it would have given an error, the EFI version. The ambient light sensor is on that bus together with a few sensors.

title: 820-2899-B super slow boot almost does't boot in OS
message: Yes true but i couldn't boot the computer in ASD so i started to unplug all the unnecessary devices i left the HDD only and it boot properly so when i plug the camera cable didn't wanna boot so i replaced the connector to solve my problem. Thanks for the response i really appreciate it
